short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily mark (without hiding!) your YouTube subscriptions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension lets you SHIFT+CLICK video thumbnails on your subscriptions feed to toggle tinting them a darker shade of color. Useful for people that have a lot of subscriptions and like making their own visual cues.

Features & Limitations
✅ Cloud sync - Persist your marked videos across different sessions/computers!
✅ Custom colors - Customize the color you want videos to be tinted with!
✅ Multi account - Logging into another account won't wipe your marked videos!
❌ Grid only - List view on the subscriptions page is unsupported.
❌ Disables previewing - This extension disables YouTube's video preview on mouseover.

Once you've installed the extension, you can use it on your Subscriptions Feed:
https://www.youtube.com/feed/subscriptions?flow=1
Note that the extension works only when you go to your sub feed directly (e.g. via bookmark).

The code is open source on GitHub - pull requests are welcome!
